name: Close Dawn - LD42 game
description:
Survive the night until 6.00AM as the darkness creeps around the corner. 

Fight off against the shadow beings. Do not let them near you. Use whatever weapons you can find. Your inventory is limited so pick wisely and abandon things you cannot carry. 

WindowsXbox GamepadMovementWASD / Arrow keysLeft joystickCamera LookMouse lookRight joystickPickup ItemEA buttonCycle InventoryMouse scroll wheel
Z to select top
X to select bottomLB to select top
